column1: Fenyi County (Chinese: 分宜县; pinyin: Fēnyí Xiàn) is a county in the northwest of Jiangxi province
column2: the People's Republic of China. It is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Xinyu.

column1: Fenyi Country has a humid subtropical climate with abundant rainfall and sunshine
column2: and a long frost-free period. It has an average yearly temperature of 17.2 degrees
column5: and a frost-free period of 270 days.
